stereo.preprocess.filter_cells¶

stereo.preprocess.filter_cells(adata, min_gene=None, max_gene=None, n_genes_by_counts=None, pct_counts_mt=None, cell_list=None, obs_key=None, inplace=True)¶

filter cells based on numbers of genes expressed .

Parameters

  • adata – AnnData object

  • min_gene – Minimum number of genes expressed for a cell pass filtering.

  • max_gene – Maximum number of genes expressed for a cell pass filtering.

  • n_genes_by_counts – Minimum number of n_genes_by_counts for a cell pass filtering.

  • pct_counts_mt – Maximum number of pct_counts_mt for a cell pass filtering.

  • cell_list – the list of cells which will be filtered.

  • obs_key – the key of adata.obs to find the name of cell. if None, adata.obs.index replace.

  • inplace – whether inplace the original adata or return a new anndata.

Returns

AnnData object if inplace id true else none
